sections.text:
2016 Repeal.

Chapter 37 (§§ 3701 - 3708) was added February 12, 2004, P.L.99, No.12, and repealed July 13, 2016, P.L.526, No.84, effective immediately. The subject matter can now be found in Article XIX-F of the act of March 4, 1971, P.L.6, No.2, known as the Tax Reform Code of 1971.
